channel.title: Bug Report for NogsInserters
channel.description:
I saw that this was added when check on the mods today and figured I'd give it a go. Now I'm in Exper. due to the new pipes, etc and I unlocked the first inserters and was trying them out. They placed fine on the ground but when I tried to add power to them it completely froze the game, no error or crash. Music and sound kept playing. I went back tried on normal build for the game and still did it, but took a minute to register. *On EXP: instant, Normal Took a moment. Figured I'd pass it along
I do have other mods installed, (Wish there was a way to EXPORT mod list) Light it up Ficit-Networks Mk++ Wall Pipe Supports Floor Hole and Ceiling Logistics Refined Power Generator with More Pipes Big Storage Tank and Megapump Fluid Sink and More Multi Splitter/Merger Balancer Passive Mode Conveyor Wall hole 100+ milestones and deps Item Dispenser Item Hopper Resource Node Creator (added at the same time as Inserter) Micro Manage Fluid Extras Powered Conveyor Stackable Pole Programmable Elevators X3 Roads Icon Sign panel Safe T-Walkways Configurable Start X3 Signs Foundation Industries Extended Power Poles Packing Ficzip Nuke Waste Cheat Double Freight Car Get Back here Ramped Fences 10x AP Satisfactory Helper Wall Conveyors Farming Mod Boxed Uranium Moarfactory +Deps Rocket Turbo Pumps Magic Machine (Used for Testing) Cheap Power Shards Ficsalot Daisy Chain Power Cables Deco Covered Conveyor Belt More Fences Exosuit Adv Logistics W Furniure Pak Utility Mod Sloped Walls Extendable Walkways Miner Mk4 Hard Drives Cheat Utility Signs Synthetic Paint PUREX Conveyors Mod Holes

item.title: Bug Report for NogsInserters
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:

it’s a dependency of interesters plus, uninstall inserter plus to uninstall it. the reason why the SMM doesn’t let you remove it is to avoid issues with playing the game

Read full topic

item.title: Bug Report for NogsInserters
item.dc:creator: @Lacer_Glechner Lacer
item.description:
@Lacer_Glechner wrote:

Hello, I’ve got the same problem
In addition, you can no longer uninstall the mod

in modmanager writes: Dependency of InserterPlus

Can someone help me thank you

image550×1040 92.6 KB

Read full topic

item.title: Bug Report for NogsInserters
item.dc:creator: @Nogg-aholic Nogg Aholic
item.description:
@Nogg-aholic wrote:

I will need Logs, specifically the pre-launch-debug.log from those crashes. Im not sure why not everyone has this problem though. Also maybe fixed already with the most recent Version.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug Report for NogsInserters
item.dc:creator: @Tryst46 Tryst46
item.description:
@Tryst46 wrote:

Same here. After that, even dismantling the inserter, any use of the cable to add power will freeze the game.

You can select the cable in the toolbar, but as soon as you hover over anything to attach it, the game freezes.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug Report for NogsInserters
item.dc:creator: @Francisco_Miras_Garc Francisco Miras García
item.description:
@Francisco_Miras_Garc wrote:

I have the same problem, with the same reproduction steps, and only installled NogsInserters

Read full topic

I saw that this was added when check on the mods today and figured I’d give it a go. Now I’m in Exper. due to the new pipes, etc and I unlocked the first inserters and was trying them out.
